content:
Mohan Nataraj is a professional Computer Scientist & Pure Mathematician from the Silicon Valley of India – Bangalore with professional experience of two or more years working in start up in the Bay Area. My research interests include distribution of prime number, continuous and discrete topology (graph theory), abstract algebra, statistics and any programmable matter. I lead myself with great confidence at any work I do & imperiously believe in the following,
“It is by his activities and not by enjoyment that a man feels he is alive. In idleness we not only feel life is fleeting, but also feel lifeless “ - Immanuel Kant
As a part of my hobby I perform calisthenics as well as into professional boxing which is a great way to exercise and keep my body active. I also love snow boarding and hiking, apart from physical activities you can notice my innate passion towards mathematics, philosophy and technology.
For more follow my posts.
